category-edited.default-category: Newly tickets will be created as new channels under the category %{category}!
category-edited.default-channel: Newly tickets will be created as new threads in the channel %{channel}!
category-edited.category-permission-warning: It looks like I don't have the permissions to create new channels under that category. Please fix the situation by granting me the **'Manage Channels' permission**, or I won't be able to add new tickets at all.
category-edited.channel-privacy-warning: It looks like I cannot create private threads in this channel. Make sure you have **unlocked** them and I have the **required permission**. Otherwise I will create tickets as public threads and anyone may be able to read them.

en.emote-edited: The emote for the topic "%{topic}" has been edited!

format.too-long: Your channel name format cannot exceed %{max} characters!

edited.default: The default name format has correctly been edited!
edited.topic: The name format for the topic "%{topic}" has been edited.

hint-edited.default: The default hint has correctly been edited!
hint-edited.topic: The hint for the topic "%{topic}" has correctly been edited!

en.missing-category-config: Oops, I couldn't create your ticket because no one told me where to create them. Please ask a server moderator to use the `tickets portal set-category` command.

missing-perms-creation.channel: Oops, I couldn't create a new ticket channel. Please make sure I have the required permissions and try again.
missing-perms-creation.thread: Oops, I couldn't create a new ticket thread. Please make sure I have the required permissions and try again.

missing-perms-setup.to-staff: Oops, I couldn't set up the channel permissions for your ticket. Please make sure I have the 'Manage roles' permission in the category %{category}, else anyone having access to this category may be able to see new tickets.
missing-perms-setup.to-member: Oops, I couldn't properly set up your ticket channel. Please ask a server moderator to fix my permissions, otherwise anyone having access to the tickets category may be able to read your ticket.

role-edited.default: The default role allowed to see tickets has been edited!
role-edited.topic: The role allowed to see tickets of topic "%{topic}" has been edited!

en.text-edited: The message displayed with the selection of a ticket has been edited
en.ticket-created: Ticket opened in %{channel} with the topic "%{topic}"!

ticket-introduction.title: New ticket created!
ticket-introduction.description:
Welcome %{user} in your ticket about '%{ticket_name}'! Someone should quickly answer your concerns right here.
As a reminder, you selected the topic **'%{topic_name}'**

title-modal.title: Your ticket
title-modal.label: Your subject
title-modal.placeholder: Type here a meaningful ticket name

en.too-quick: You are opening tickets too quick! Please wait a few minutes between two tickets

topic.cant-create: Oops, unable to create this topic. Make sure you do not already have a topic with this name, and contact support if needed
topic.created: The topic "%{name}" has successfully been created
topic.other-already-exists: An "other" topic is already proposed by default by Zbot, no need to add one :innocent:
topic.too-long: The topic name cannot exceed 100 characters
